cast.name: 亚当·伊尔德·罗威德 Adam Ild Rohweder

introduction: At last, Michael is getting his life back on track when his elder brother Johnny shows up unexpectedly. Johnny owes money to some people who resort to extreme measures whenever a debt is to be collected. Michael does not wish to participate in any of this; however, when he can sense Johnnys desperation, he reluctantly agrees to help him. Nonetheless, you never acquire that amount of dough at such short notice without getting your hands dirty...
